pli-tv-bi-vb-pc84:6.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc84:6.2: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo chattupāhanaṃ dhārenti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc84:6.4: “kathañhi nāma bhikkhuniyo chattupāhanaṃ dhāressanti, seyyathāpi gihiniyo kāmabhoginiyo”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc84:7.1: Assosuṃ kho bhikkhuniyo tesaṃ manussānaṃ ujjhāyantānaṃ khiyyantānaṃ vipācentānaṃ.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc84:7.4: “kathañhi nāma chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo chattupāhanaṃ dhāressantī”ti … pe …
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc84:7.5: “saccaṃ kira, bhikkhave, chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo chattupāhanaṃ dhārentī”ti?
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc84:7.8: kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo chattupāhanaṃ dhāressanti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc84:7.9: Netaṃ, bhikkhave, appasannānaṃ vā pasādāya … pe …
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc84:7.10: evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddisantu—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc84:9.1: Evañcidaṃ bhagavatā bhikkhunīnaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ paññattaṃ hoti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc84:10.1: Tena kho pana samayena aññatarā bhikkhunī gilānā hoti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc84:10.2: Tassā vinā chattupāhanaṃ na phāsu hoti … pe …
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc84:10.5: Evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddisantu—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc84:11.1: “Yā pana bhikkhunī agilānā chattupāhanaṃ dhāreyya, pācittiyan”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc84:14.2: yassā vinā chattupāhanaṃ na phāsu hoti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc84:16.1: Agilānā agilānasaññā chattupāhanaṃ dhāreti, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc84:16.2: Agilānā vematikā chattupāhanaṃ dhāreti, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc84:16.3: Agilānā gilānasaññā chattupāhanaṃ dhāreti, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc84:17.1: Chattaṃ dhāreti na upāhanaṃ, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc84:17.2: Upāhanaṃ dhāreti na chattaṃ, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc84:18.2: gilānāya, ārāme ārāmūpacāre dhāreti, āpadāsu, ummattikāya, ādikammikāyāti.
